content: --- title: Crew Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-10-02T06:55:59.503Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:33:03.978Z --- # Crew Info Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | idCardNo | `'string'` | Company identification card serial number | | secondaryId | `'string'` | If company uses secondary employee identifier | | surname | `'string'` | Surname | | forenames | `'string'` | All given names | | preferredName | `'string'` | Name preferred to be communicated | | maidenName | `'string'` | Surname before marriage | | title | `'string'` | Title | | birthDay | `'date'` | Date of birthday in local timezone | | birthCity | `'string'` | City of birthday | | birthCountry | `'string'` | Country of birthday | | nationality | `'string'` | Origin of citizenship | | citizenshipId | `'string'` | Identification number of citizenship | | sex | `'char'` | Gender M or F | | bloodType | `'string'` | Blood group code A,B,AB,0 combined with Rh+ or Rh- | | maritalStatus | `'char'` | Martial status of crew, M or S | | marriageDate | `'date'` | Date of marriage, if multiple the last one in local timezone| | category | `'string'` | Crew category, C, S, T or D etc. | | period | `'string'` | Crew graduation or employment group identifier | | employmentDate | `'date'` | Date of employment in local timezone | | firstFlightDate | `'date'` | Date of first flight in UTC | | leaveDate | `'date'` | Date of leave if applicable in local timezone | | leaveReason | `'string'` | Reason of leave if applicable | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Roster Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :--------------------- | :----------: | :-------------------------------------- | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | rosterId | `'string'` | Published roster id of the crew | | publishDate | `'dateti
